tool_description: Selects optimal imaging protocols based on clinical indication, patient characteristics, and equipment capabilities.

imaging_modality.description: Type of imaging: CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound, nuclear_medicine, fluoroscopy

previous_imaging.description: Whether patient has previous imaging for comparison

error_messages: Invalid clinical indication: Clinical indication must be a non-empty descriptive string.
Unsupported imaging modality: Use one of [CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound, nuclear_medicine, fluoroscopy].
Invalid body region: Body region must be a valid anatomical designation.
Invalid patient age: Age must be a positive integer between 0 and 150.
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [routine, urgent, emergency].
Equipment model not found: The specified equipment model is not available in the protocol database.
usage: Provide clinical_indication, imaging_modality, body_region, and patient_age_years. Optionally specify equipment_model, urgency_level, and previous_imaging for protocol optimization.

protocol_name.description: Name of the selected imaging protocol

technical_parameters.description: List of key technical parameters for the protocol

contrast_required.description: Whether contrast agent is required for this protocol
